scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The photographs in this collection were taken by Radford University Public Relations photographers and contract photographers during the 1980s. The photographs consist primarily of promotional photos taken to accompany press release or to meet special photography requests. Examples of photographs included in this collection, either a photograph of the description itself or as being associated with the organization in the description are aerial photos, archives, area coordinators, basketball clinics, mens basketball, biology, black week, Pat Carroll, Ellen Carson, campus shots, communication disorders, dance worshop from 1975, informal dances, dorm life, dormitories, Equestrian, and miscellaneous photos.
